trans-unit.source: Specifies the data source and data member properties for a component that supports complex data binding.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a fonte de dados e propriedades de membro de dados para um componente que oferece suporte à associação de dados complexos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute is used to specify the properties used with complex data binding, such as binding based on <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute é usado para especificar as propriedades usadas com associação de dados complexos, como associação com base em <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute attribute is specified at the class level.
trans-unit.target: O atributo ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute é especificado no nível de classe.

trans-unit.source: It is inheritable and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
trans-unit.target: Ele é herdável e não permite vários atributos da mesma classe.

trans-unit.source: A control can support both simple binding, with <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>, as well as complex binding.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode oferecer suporte a ambos os associação simples, com <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>, bem como associação complexa.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o uso de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using no parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> classe usando sem parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de construtor padrão de <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>propriedades `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> classe usando a fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>propriedade `dataSource` e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser usado como a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> classe usando a fonte de dados especificado e o membro de dados.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `dataMember`.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>propriedade `dataSource` e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>propriedade `dataMember`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser usado como a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the source for data.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser usado como a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da propriedade do membro de dados para o componente ao qual o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set in the constructors for this class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataMember é definida em construtores para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The name of the data member property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade do membro de dados para o componente para o qual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> está associada

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data source property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da propriedade de fonte de dados para o componente ao qual o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is set in the constructors for this class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataSource está definida em construtores para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade de fonte de dados para o componente para o qual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa o valor padrão para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Default member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: O membro padrão é um campo estático, somente leitura, que define uma instância do <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>classe inicializada com o construtor padrão.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref:System.Object>é igual à atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Equals method returns `true` if `obj` is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o método Equals `true` se `obj` é do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>Propriedades de dois objetos são iguais.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para comparar com a atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"> </xref> instância</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto for igual à instância atual; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, indicando que não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash de inteiro de 32 bits.
